sentence: move the foremost red block to the right side of the red block which is on its rear right side
move the rearmost red block to the rear left side of the middle red block
move the foremost purple block to the center front
move the green block to the top of the first moved block
move the red block on the left of the rightmost red block to the front left corner
move the red block that you have not touched yet to the rear side of the rightmost red block
